hero.title: Backend & Database Plan
hero.subtitle: A comprehensive overview of the database and API specifications

database.introDesc: Think of the database as an organized library: each type of information has its own place. This lets you update content from the admin panel without needing a developer.
database.structureDesc: Each box represents a type of data you can manage

products.label: Products
products.title: Products & Descriptions
products.desc: Product names, prices, sizes (e.g. 900g), features, ingredients, nutritional info, and images. All in Arabic and English.

orders.label: Orders
orders.title: Customer Orders
orders.desc: Each order: customer name, phone, address, items ordered, total, payment method. You can update status (processing, shipped, delivered, etc.).

blog.label: Blog
blog.title: Articles & Tips
blog.desc: Articles on nutrition, cat care, halal tips. Each post has title, excerpt, content, image, and category. In Arabic and English.

content.label: Content
content.title: Page Content
content.desc: Headlines, paragraphs, FAQs, testimonials, Why Halal section, nutrition info. Updated from the admin panel without touching code.

messages.label: Messages
messages.title: Contact Messages
messages.desc: Every message from the contact form: name, email, subject, and text. You can mark as read or replied.

newsletter.label: Newsletter
newsletter.title: Newsletter Subscribers
newsletter.desc: List of emails from newsletter signups. Useful for campaigns and future offers.

database.bilingualDesc: Stored text supports both languages. When a customer switches language, content appears in that language automatically. No need to enter both versions manually — the admin panel lets you edit in English and Arabic together.
database.settingsShippingDetail: Free shipping threshold, delivery fee, currency
database.summaryTitle: In the End — What Will You Get?
summaryItems: Update products and prices without a developer
Receive and track orders from the dashboard
Publish articles and tips in Arabic & English
Edit page text (home, about, why halal, etc.)
View customer messages and newsletter subscribers
database.tableDetailsDesc: Brief explanation of what each table stores
database.tableProductsDetail: Stores product name, description, type (chicken/tuna/combo), price, compare-at price, features, nutritional info, ingredients, multiple images, in-stock status, and featured flag.
database.tableProductSizesDetail: Each product can have multiple sizes: e.g. 400g, 900g, 2kg. Each size has its own price and SKU.
database.tableOrdersDetail: Order number, customer name, email, phone, delivery address (city, emirate), subtotal, shipping, total, status (pending, shipped, delivered, cancelled), payment method.
database.tableOrderItemsDetail: Each order contains several products. Each item: product name (AR + EN), size, quantity, price, and line subtotal.

backend.introDesc: API structure, endpoints, language support, and technical recommendations
backend.bilingualDesc: Priority: lang query first, then Accept-Language, then fallback to en. On save (Admin) accepts both language fields.
